TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 繫結 HTTP 要求 欄位的值到參數物件。

span.span: Binds the value of an HTTP request field to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用類別繫結中的表單變數的值參數型的查詢或命令中使用之參數的集合。You can use the class to bind the value of a form variable in the collection to a parameter used in a parameterized query or command. 將資料繫結至參數的控制項可能會擲回例外狀況，如果指定但沒有對應的表單變數會傳遞。Controls that bind data to the parameter might throw an exception if a is specified but no corresponding form variable is passed. 如果沒有對應值的表單變數傳遞，它們也可能會顯示任何資料。They might also display no data if the form variable is passed with no corresponding value. 設定若要避免這些情況下，適當的位置。Set the to avoid these situations where appropriate. 類別提供屬性，其可識別要繫結，除了繼承自表單變數的名稱類別。The class provides the property, which identifies the name of the form variable to bind to, in addition to those inherited from the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不以任何方式; 表單項目所傳遞的值會驗證它會使用原始值。The does not validate the value passed by the form element in any way; it uses the raw value. 在大部分情況下，您可以驗證的值它所處理的事件，例如使用資料來源控制項之前`Selecting`， `Updating`， `Inserting`，或`Deleting`您使用的資料來源控制項所公開的事件。In most cases you can validate the value of the before it is used by a data source control by handling an event, such as the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event exposed by the data source control you are using. 如果參數的值未通過驗證測試，您可以藉由設定取消資料作業屬性相關聯的類別`true`。If the value of the parameter does not pass your validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將資料插入資料庫，使用控制項和簡單的 ASP.NET Web 網頁。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple ASP.NET Web page. 在資料表中目前的資料會顯示在控制項。The current data in the data table is displayed in the control. 您可以輸入中的值，以新增新記錄控制項，然後按一下 [] 按鈕。You can add new records by entering values in the controls and clicking the button. 按一下按鈕時，將指定的值插入資料庫，而會重新整理。When the button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and the is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件以建立建構函式會使用其所有屬性的預設值初始化。A object created with the constructor is initialized with default values for all its properties. 會初始化為。The is initialized to . 此外，屬性會初始化為、屬性會初始化為、屬性會初始化為，而屬性會初始化為 null (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。Additionally, the property is initialized to , the property is initialized to , the property is initialized to , and the property is initialized to null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). ## Examples > [!IMPORTANT] > 不以任何方式; 表單項目所傳遞的值會驗證它會使用原始值。The does not validate the value passed by the form element in any way; it uses the raw value. 在大部分情況下，您可以驗證的值它所處理的事件，例如使用資料來源控制項之前`Selecting`， `Updating`， `Inserting`，或`Deleting`您使用的資料來源控制項所公開的事件。In most cases, you can validate the value of the before it is used by a data source control by handling an event, such as the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event exposed by the data source control you are using. 如果參數的值未通過驗證測試，您可以藉由設定取消資料作業屬性相關聯的類別`true`。If the value of the parameter does not pass your validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件以建立建構函式會使用指定的參數名稱，初始化，和識別繫結的參數的表單變數的字串。A object created with the constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name, , and string that identifies the form variable that the parameter binds to. 只有和屬性會初始化使用預設值。Only the and properties are initialized with default values. ## Examples > [!IMPORTANT] > 不以任何方式; 表單項目所傳遞的值會驗證它會使用原始值。The does not validate the value passed by the form element in any way; it uses the raw value. 在大部分情況下，您可以驗證的值它所處理的事件，例如使用資料來源控制項之前`Selecting`， `Updating`， `Inserting`，或`Deleting`您使用的資料來源控制項所公開的事件。In most cases, you can validate the value of the before it is used by a data source control by handling an event, such as the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event exposed by the data source control you are using. 如果參數的值未通過驗證測試，您可以藉由設定取消資料作業屬性相關聯的類別`true`。If the value of the parameter does not pass your validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫複製建構函式來初始化的新執行個體類別目前的執行個體的值。The method calls the copy constructor to initialize a new instance of the class with the values of the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 嘗試繫結至的表單變數每次方法呼叫。The attempts to bind to the form variable every time the method is called. `context`參數由用方法來擷取要求中指定的表單欄位的值。The `context` parameter is used by the method to retrieve the value of the specified form field from the request. `control`參數已忽略。The `control` parameter is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public string FormField { get; set; }
.property instance string FormField
Public Property FormField As String
public: property System::String ^ FormField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定參數所繫結的表單變數名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the form variable that the parameter binds to.

value.span: 識別參數所繫結之表單變數的字串。

span.span: A string that identifies the form variable to which the parameter binds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 識別傳入的名稱/值組集合。The identifies a name/value pair that is passed in the collection. 雖然屬性會識別組的名稱在執行階段繫結至其對應的值。While the property identifies the name of the pair, the binds to its corresponding value at run time. 如果預期的表單變數的字串名稱/值組不會傳送到集合中的 ASP.NET Web 網頁方法繫結的參數值屬性如果設定。If the expected form variable string name/value pair is not passed to the ASP.NET Web page in the collection, the method binds the parameter to the value of the property, if it is set. 如果未設定，方法時，無法將參數繫結的值。If the is not set, the method fails to bind the parameter to a value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示篩選的資料使用控制項和來自中介層商務物件擷取資料和控制項來顯示結果。The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control and a to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 程式碼範例包含、控制項，控制項，以及送出按鈕。The code example consists of a , a control, the control, and a submit button. 根據預設，會填入其中一個 Northwind Traders 員工的名稱。By default, the is populated with the name of one of the Northwind Traders employees. 顯示中的名稱所識別的員工資訊。The displays information about the employee identified by the name in the . 若要擷取另一位員工的資料，請輸入中的員工的完整名稱按一下按鈕。To retrieve data on another employee, enter the full name of the employee in the and click the button. 屬性會指定用來篩選所擷取的資料運算式。The property specifies an expression used to filter the data retrieved by the . 這個屬性會使用參數預留位置中所包含的參數進行評估之集合。This property uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters contained in the collection. 在此範例中，參數預留位置是繫結至的值控制項。In this example, the parameter placeholder is a bound to the value of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/objds9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/objds9vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例顯示先前的程式碼範例所使用的中介層商務物件。The following code example shows the middle-tier business object that the previous code example uses. 這個範例包含兩個基本類別：`EmployeeLogic`類別會封裝商務邏輯和`NorthwindEmployee`類別是包含只需以載入保存資料與資料層的基本功能的模型類別。This example consists of two basic classes: The `EmployeeLogic` class encapsulates business logic, and the `NorthwindEmployee` class is a model class that contains only the basic functionality required to load and persist data from the data tier. 為了簡單起見，`EmployeeLogic`類別會建立一組靜態的資料，而非從資料層擷取資料。For simplicity, the `EmployeeLogic` class creates a static set of data, rather than retrieving the data from a data tier. 它也很有用的此範例中，因為此範例依賴使用者提供示範篩選 Northwind Traders 員工的完整名稱。It is also helpful for this example, because the sample relies on the user to provide the full name of a Northwind Traders employee to demonstrate filtering. 如需完整的工作範例，您必須編譯，並使用這些類別提供的 ASP.NET 程式碼範例。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the ASP.NET code examples provided. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不以任何方式; 表單項目所傳遞的值會驗證它會使用原始值。The does not validate the value passed by the form element in any way; it uses the raw value. 在大部分情況下，您可以驗證的值它所處理的事件，例如使用資料來源控制項之前`Selecting`， `Updating`， `Inserting`，或`Deleting`您使用的資料來源控制項所公開的事件。In most cases, you can validate the value of the before it is used by a data source control by handling an event, such as the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event exposed by the data source control you are using. 如果參數的值未通過驗證測試，您可以藉由設定取消資料作業屬性相關聯的類別`true`。If the value of the parameter does not pass your validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/northwindemployee9.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/northwindemployee9.vb#2)]
